mapper.select: SELECT M.MS_NUM , M.MS_NAME , MS_IMAGENAME , NOTICE_DIV , PRO_MUST_YN , PRO_REMARK , NOTICE_OPEN_YN FROM PRO_NOTICE N RIGHT OUTER JOIN DR_MS_MAININFO M ON N.MS_NUM = M.MS_NUM WHERE 1 = 1 AND M.MS_NUM = ${msNum} AND IFNULL(NULLIF(M.MS_BLANK,''),'N') = 'N' AND N.NOTICE_OPEN_YN = 'Y'
SELECT MS_NUM , MS_IMG_NAME , MS_IMG_DATA FROM DR_MS_PICTURE WHERE 1 = 1 AND MS_NUM = ${msNum}

SELECT M.MS_NUM , M.MS_NAME , LIC_SEQ , LIC_KIND , LIC_REMARK , CD_TITLE1 AS LIC_NAME FROM PRO_LICENSE L RIGHT OUTER JOIN DR_MS_MAININFO M ON M.MS_NUM = L.MS_NUM INNER JOIN CD_COMMON C ON C.CD_CODE = L.LIC_KIND AND C.CD_DIVISION = '018' WHERE 1 = 1 AND M.MS_NUM = ${msNum} AND IFNULL(NULLIF(M.MS_BLANK,''),'N') = 'N' ORDER BY CD_SORT
